overview: With the collapse of the Iron Curtain, Russian soldiers are withdrawing from Eastern Europe, and they have some exiting stories to share. For the first time ever you will learn about the initiation of hunky, young Soviet soldiers and their hot Hungarian comrades into the pleasures of Man-Sex. You will experience the heat and passion of male to male action from Budapest to Moscow. It is an experience you will not soon forget.
title: Comrades in Arms
